column5: This 1 bedroom, 1.5 bath condominium is conveniently located across the street from the beach and on the canal. The entrance is on the ground floor and the bedroom is on the second floor. This unit has many amenities for your convenience including easy access to Packery Channel and a Fishing Deck with underwater fishing lights.
column8: LEEWARD COVE A5, 1 BD 1.5 BTH, WALK 2 BEACH
